title: Introduction to the Duolingo English Test
description:
Students discussed the structure and components of the official Duolingo English Test, including the types of questions asked, skills assessed, and tips/tricks to do well on the exam.


Students will take a Duolingo English practice test during grading week to assess their base score.

title: Typing Workshop
description: Students visited Typing.com to continue practicing the typing skills we discussed in Term 1 (October 31st workshop)

title: Note Taking Habits
description: During this workshop, students were taught four different note taking methods and discussed their usage, advantages, and disadvantages. Using one of the methods discussed, take notes on a 4 minute video titled Exploring Afrobeats Dance: Essence, Origins, and Uniqueness
assignment_description: Methods discussed: Outlining Method, Cornell Method, Mind Mapping, Charting Method

title: Intro to CRC
description: During this workshop, students were given a thorough introduction to the CRC department and new CRC fellows. Students also discussed what to expect from the CRC, the various resources offered, and what to expect from the CRC workshops during Term 1.
